name: Grav\Common\Page\Page
short_desc:
The Page object, or "Page" object is the main powerhouse of Grav.  It contains all the information
related to the nested pages structure that represents the content. Each page has several attributes that
can be retrieved via public functions. Also each page can potentially contain an array of sub-pages.
long_desc: Recursively traversing the page structure allows Grav to create navigation systems.

init.name: init
init.short_desc: Initializes the page instance variables based on a file

file.name: file
file.short_desc: The file information for the .md file that the page represents

translatedLanguages.name: translatedLanguages
translatedLanguages.short_desc: Return an array with the routes of other translated languages

untranslatedLanguages.name: untranslatedLanguages
untranslatedLanguages.short_desc: Return an array listing untranslated languages available

raw.name: raw
raw.short_desc: Gets and Sets the raw data

header.name: header
header.short_desc: Gets and Sets the header based on the YAML configuration at the top of the .md file

var.name: var
var.short_desc: a YAML object representing the configuration for the file

setSummary.name: setSummary
setSummary.short_desc: Sets the summary of the page
errors: The "var" @param tag variable name is wrong (should be "summary")

content.name: content
content.short_desc: Gets and Sets the content based on content portion of the .md file

getRawContent.name: getRawContent
getRawContent.short_desc: Needed by the onPageContentProcessed event to get the raw page content

setRawContent.name: setRawContent
setRawContent.short_desc: Needed by the onPageContentProcessed event to set the raw page content

value.name: value
value.short_desc: Get value from a page variable (used mostly for creating edit forms).

file.name: file
file.short_desc: Get file object to the page.

save.name: save
save.short_desc: Save page if there's a file assigned to it.

move.name: move
move.short_desc: Prepare move page to new location. Moves also everything that's under the current page.
move.long_desc: You need to call $this->save() in order to perform the move.

copy.name: copy
copy.short_desc: Prepare a copy from the page. Copies also everything that's under the current page.
copy.long_desc:
Returns a new Page object for the copy.
You need to call $this->save() in order to perform the move.

blueprintName.name: blueprintName
blueprintName.short_desc: Get the blueprint name for this page.  Use the blueprint form field if set

filter.name: filter
filter.short_desc: Filter page header from illegal contents.

toYaml.name: toYaml
toYaml.short_desc: Convert page to YAML encoded string.

toJson.name: toJson
toJson.short_desc: Convert page to JSON encoded string.

media.name: media
media.short_desc: Gets and sets the associated media as found in the page folder.

name.name: name
name.short_desc: Gets and sets the name field.  If no name field is set, it will return 'default.md'.

template.name: template
template.short_desc: Gets and sets the template field. This is used to find the correct Twig template file to render.
template.long_desc: If no field is set, it will return the name without the .md extension

extension.name: extension
extension.short_desc: Gets and sets the extension field.

expires.name: expires
expires.short_desc: Gets and sets the expires field. If not set will return the default

title.name: title
title.short_desc: Gets and sets the title for this Page.  If no title is set, it will use the slug() to get a name

menu.name: menu
menu.short_desc: Gets and sets the menu name for this Page.  This is the text that can be used specifically for navigation.
menu.long_desc: If no menu field is set, it will use the title()
menu.hint_desc: the menu field for the page

var.name: var
var.short_desc: the menu field for the page

visible.name: visible
visible.short_desc: Gets and Sets whether or not this Page is visible for navigation
visible.hint_desc: true if the page is visible

var.name: var
var.short_desc: true if the page is visible

published.name: published
published.short_desc: Gets and Sets whether or not this Page is considered published
published.hint_desc: true if the page is published

var.name: var
var.short_desc: true if the page is published

publishDate.name: publishDate
publishDate.short_desc: Gets and Sets the Page publish date
publishDate.hint_desc: unix timestamp representation of the date

unpublishDate.name: unpublishDate
unpublishDate.short_desc: Gets and Sets the Page unpublish date
unpublishDate.hint_desc: unix timestamp representation of the date

routable.name: routable
routable.short_desc:
Gets and Sets whether or not this Page is routable, ie you can reach it
via a URL.
routable.hint_desc: true if the page is routable

var.name: var
var.short_desc: true if the page is routable

process.name: process
process.short_desc:
Gets and Sets the process setup for this Page. This is multi-dimensional array that consists of
a simple array of arrays with the form array("markdown"=>true) for example
process.hint_desc: an Array of name value pairs where the name is the process and value is true or false

var.name: var
var.short_desc: an Array of name value pairs where the name is the process and value is true or false

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.short_desc:
Function to merge page metadata tags and build an array of Metadata objects
that can then be rendered in the page.
metadata.hint_desc: an Array of metadata values for the page

var.name: var
var.short_desc: an Array of metadata values to set

slug.name: slug
slug.short_desc:
Gets and Sets the slug for the Page. The slug is used in the URL routing. If not set it uses
the parent folder from the path

order.name: order
order.short_desc: Get/set order number of this page.

permalink.name: permalink
permalink.short_desc: Gets the URL with host information, aka Permalink.

link.name: link
link.short_desc: Gets the URL for a page - alias of url().

url.name: url
url.short_desc: Gets the url for the Page.
errors: "3" @param tags are expected but only "2" found

route.name: route
route.short_desc:
Gets the route for the page based on the route headers if available, else from
the parents route and the current Page's slug.

unsetRouteSlug.name: unsetRouteSlug
unsetRouteSlug.short_desc: Helper method to clear the route out so it regenerates next time you use it

routeAliases.name: routeAliases
routeAliases.short_desc: Gets the route aliases for the page based on page headers.
routeAliases.hint_desc: The route aliases for the Page.

routeCanonical.name: routeCanonical
routeCanonical.short_desc:
Gets the canonical route for this page if its set. If provided it will use
that value, else if it's `true` it will use the default route.

id.name: id
id.short_desc: Gets and sets the identifier for this Page object.

modified.name: modified
modified.short_desc: Gets and sets the modified timestamp.

redirect.name: redirect
redirect.short_desc: Gets the redirect set in the header.

eTag.name: eTag
eTag.short_desc: Gets and sets the option to show the etag header for the page.

lastModified.name: lastModified
lastModified.short_desc: Gets and sets the option to show the last_modified header for the page.

filePath.name: filePath
filePath.short_desc: Gets and sets the path to the .md file for this Page object.

filePathClean.name: filePathClean
filePathClean.short_desc: Gets the relative path to the .md file

relativePagePath.name: relativePagePath
relativePagePath.short_desc: Returns the clean path to the page file

path.name: path
path.short_desc: Gets and sets the path to the folder where the .md for this Page object resides.
path.long_desc: This is equivalent to the filePath but without the filename.

date.name: date
date.short_desc: Gets and sets the date for this Page object. This is typically passed in via the page headers
date.hint_desc: unix timestamp representation of the date

orderDir.name: orderDir
orderDir.short_desc: Gets and sets the order by which any sub-pages should be sorted.

orderBy.name: orderBy
orderBy.short_desc: Gets and sets the order by which the sub-pages should be sorted.
orderBy.long_desc:
default - is the order based on the file system, ie 01.Home before 02.Advark
title - is the order based on the title set in the pages
date - is the order based on the date set in the pages
folder - is the order based on the name of the folder with any numerics omitted

orderManual.name: orderManual
orderManual.short_desc: Gets the manual order set in the header.

maxCount.name: maxCount
maxCount.short_desc:
Gets and sets the maxCount field which describes how many sub-pages should be displayed if the
sub_pages header property is set for this page object.

taxonomy.name: taxonomy
taxonomy.short_desc: Gets and sets the taxonomy array which defines which taxonomies this page identifies itself with.

modular.name: modular
modular.short_desc: Gets and sets the modular var that helps identify this parent page contains modular pages.

modularTwig.name: modularTwig
modularTwig.short_desc:
Gets and sets the modular_twig var that helps identify this page as a modular page that will need
twig processing handled differently from a regular page.

shouldProcess.name: shouldProcess
shouldProcess.short_desc: Gets the configured state of the processing method.
shouldProcess.hint_desc: whether or not the processing method is enabled for this Page

parent.name: parent
parent.short_desc: Gets and Sets the parent object for this page
parent.hint_desc: the parent page object if it exists.

isFirst.name: isFirst
isFirst.short_desc: Check to see if this item is the first in an array of sub-pages.

isLast.name: isLast
isLast.short_desc: Check to see if this item is the last in an array of sub-pages.

prevSibling.name: prevSibling
prevSibling.short_desc: Gets the previous sibling based on current position.

nextSibling.name: nextSibling
nextSibling.short_desc: Gets the next sibling based on current position.

adjacentSibling.name: adjacentSibling
adjacentSibling.short_desc: Returns the adjacent sibling based on a direction.

active.name: active
active.short_desc: Returns whether or not this page is the currently active page requested via the URL.

activeChild.name: activeChild
activeChild.short_desc: Returns whether or not this URI's URL contains the URL of the active page.
activeChild.long_desc: Or in other words, is this page's URL in the current URL

home.name: home
home.short_desc: Returns whether or not this page is the currently configured home page.
home.hint_desc: True if it is the homepage

root.name: root
root.short_desc: Returns whether or not this page is the root node of the pages tree.
root.hint_desc: True if it is the root

find.name: find
find.short_desc: Helper method to return a page.
find.hint_desc: page you were looking for if it exists

collection.name: collection
collection.short_desc: Get a collection of pages in the current context.

isPage.name: isPage
isPage.short_desc: Returns whether or not this Page object has a .md file associated with it or if its just a directory.
isPage.hint_desc: True if its a page with a .md file associated

isDir.name: isDir
isDir.short_desc: Returns whether or not this Page object is a directory or a page.

exists.name: exists
exists.short_desc: Returns whether the page exists in the filesystem.
